name: Depixelization
body:
### Background
This project is a GPU implementation of the 2011 SIGGRAPH paper _Depixelizing Pixel Art_ ([link](http://research.microsoft.com/en-us/um/people/kopf/pixelart/)). It is still in progress.

### Current Results
Some of the current results are listed below:
![mario](http://www.idav.ucdavis.edu/~yzhwang/images/mario.png)
![mushroom](http://www.idav.ucdavis.edu/~yzhwang/images/mushroom.png)
![dragon](http://www.idav.ucdavis.edu/~yzhwang/images/dragon.png)

### Authors and Contributors
Yangzihao Wang (@yzhwang)
tagline: Depixelization of pixel art on GPU
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
